constituent: resign, tongue, thousand, mouth, spicy, stand up, vase, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: This guy´s job is tasting the spicy curry at the local Indian Food Factory. He has to resign from his job before his tongue is rendered completely useless after all the spicy food that he has to try all day long...
koohiiStory2: After my tongue touched the most spicy pepper of all, I had to resign from the contest...too hot for me!
words:
